name: Human
description: Adaptive and ambitious, humans thrive in nearly every environment. Their strength lies not in physical dominance or magical prowess, but in their versatility and drive.

flexible_ability_adjustment.description: +1 to one ability OR +2 to one and -1 to another (not already adjusted by ancestry)

skill_choices.description: Adaptability: Gain two additional skill proficiencies of your choice.
